name: jest-learning
description: This is the simplest project setup if you'd like to get going with a single HTML file that uses SASS, Gulp and Browser-Sync. I've also included my favourite @media query mixin as a partial ([credit to David Gilbertson](https://medium.freecodecamp.org/the-100-correct-way-to-do-css-breakpoints-88d6a5ba1862))
